content.text: Hi, I'm Diane and I'm here to support you in a unique journey: taking control of your body and well-being, before and after baby.
Specialist in prenatal and postnatal fitness, with 14 years of experience as a fitness coach and manager of renowned gyms:
(l'Usine, Energie Forme, Aqualoft…), I have helped hundreds of women regain a body they feel beautiful, strong, and confident in.
And as a mom, I know exactly what you're going through. The challenges, the questions, the doubts… I've been there too.
That's why I created personalized programs that respect your pace, body, and needs.
My goal? To help you regain physical and mental harmony, safely and with results that will surprise you.

Whether live or in-person, each session is based on adapted and effective exercises, with special attention to your pelvic floor and abdominal breathing. No complicated methods, just simple and powerful practices for visible results.

Pregnant or postpartum, it can be hard to know what to do or where to start. I'll be by your side every day to answer your questions, guide you, and reassure you. No matter your journey or delivery method.
Together, we'll build a program that suits you and helps you regain that energy, well-being, and confidence in yourself.
